title: ZF Wind Power's Tamil Nadu plant rolls out 50 GW of wind gearboxes
description: ZF Wind Power, a division of ZF Group, has reached a milestone by producing 50 GW of wind gearboxes at its Coimbatore factory in Tamil Nadu, making it the largest such facility outside China. The company has invested â‚¬230 million in this plant, underscoring its commitment to the Indian market.
